caption.p: Anti-inflammatory effects of (+)- Erythro-( 7S,8R)-Δ8′,3,3′,5′-trimethoxy-8- O-4′-neolignan ( 2) ( A) against HKC-induced PGE 2 inhibitory effects on nitric oxide synthase (iNOS) and cyclooxygenase (COX)-2 at 8 h ( B) and 24 h ( C). * p < 0.01 compared with Control; B: Blank (without HKC induction), C: Control (HKC induction without 2 treatment).
